title: Mac OS X 10.0 Developer Preview Installation Sensation (Part 2) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
tags: Mac OS X 10.0 Developer Preview Installation Sensation (Part 2) - Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures
Mac OS X 10.0 Developer Preview Installation Sensation (Part 2)
description: The Mac OS X 10.0 Developer Preview excitement concludes in today's episode! Can Krazy Ken and Maniac Mike code a program in Yellow Box? Does Ken suck at Chess? Found out today  Support the show and get in the credits   Want more videos like this?   Subscribe for more tech videos!    Like the CC on Facebook   Follow the CC on Twitter   Follow Ken on Twitter: @Hildron101010  Krazy Ken's Tech Misadventures #96 - Mac OS X 10.0 Developer Preview (Part 2)  Krazy Ken is now on Patreon! Pledge now to help support the show and get an opportunity to be in the show's credits!   Contact the CC    Want music for your videos?   (We use these guys a lot. They're good.)  Get film gear Ken uses   On a lower budget?   Amazon links are powered by the Amazon Associates Program.  COMPUTER CLAN COLLABORATORS INVOLVED IN THIS VIDEO midnightxenesis - as Maniac Mike Ken (Hildron101010)  #KrazyKen
